description: Creates or updates the image manifest and tags that are associated with an image. When an image is pushed and all new image layers have been uploaded, the PutImage API is called once to create or update the image manifest and the tags that are associated with the image.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository where the image is put.

parameters.name: imageManifest
parameters.description: The image manifest that corresponds to the image to be uploaded.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that's associated with the registry containing the image.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository that's associated with the image.

nested_items.name: imageDigest
nested_items.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

nested_items.name: imageTag
nested_items.description: The tag that's used for the image.

nested_items.name: imageManifest
nested_items.description: The image manifest that's associated with the image.

nested_items.name: imageManifestMediaType
nested_items.description: The manifest media type of the image.
